hondama sahaya niliya – aan hethawe(le misrable)* hondama sahaya naluwa - kristof wolts (jango anchend)* hondama pariganaka sajiwikarana chithrapataya - ‘brew’* hodama sajiwikarana keti chithrapataya – ‘peparman’* hondama kamarakaranaya - klodiyo miranda (layif of payi)* hondama drushyaprayoga - ‘layif of payi’* hondama wasthrabharana nirmanaya – ‘ana karanina’hondama wes ganwima – ‘le misrable’hondama keti chithrapataya – ‘karfiyu’ (sajiwikarana)* hondama wartha (keti) chithrapataya – ‘inosanti’* hondama wisheshanga wartha chithrapataya – ‘sarchin fo shugar man’* hondama wides chithrapataya – ‘amore’* hondama sanskaranaya - ‘aargo’ – wiliyam goldanbarg* hondama nishpadaka salasumkaranaya - ‘linkan’rik katar – nishpadana salasumkaranayajimi eriksan – darshana thala sakasuma* hondama swiya sangithaya – ‘layif of payi’ wenuwen mayikal dana* hodama chithrapata githaya - jems bond chithrapatayak wana ‘skayi fol’ - sangithaya ha pada rachanaya – adel adkins ha pol eepwarth* ‘aargo’ wenuwen kris teriyo kruthiyak padaka kara ganimin rachitha hondama thira natakaya* hondama swiya thira rachanaya –‘jango anchend’ – kwentin tarantino* hondama adhyakshanaya – aang li ‘layif of payi’* hondama niliya - jenifar lorans (silwar layinings plebuk)* hondama naluwa - daniyel de luwis (linkan)* hondama chithrapataya – (aargo) ben eflek, grant heslow, jorj kluniakadami sammana ithihasaya adhyayanaya kala wita ehi rasawath siduwimwalin anuna bawa kiwa hakiya.
